Projects

Most recent work

Tetris in Vanilla Javascript

My favorite childhood game recreated with Canvas & DOM manipulation. Creation of the playfield and shapes. Implementation of collision & block rotation. Animated interactions with arrow keys. Display of player stats. Try it yourself!

Demo

Rick and Morty API

Use of a public API. Three pages listing data of all episodes, characters and locations of the Rick and Morty universe. Project was design free & done in HTML/SCSS/Javascript. Agile working with two other devs & merge of our work.

Demo

Soundboard Js

Simple web page, containing different drum sounds triggered by pressing specific keys on the keyboard. Usage of ASCII key codes, Document Object Model, Javascript & Parcel Bundler. Give it shot, click the button or press the key.

Demo

SCSS Solar System

Planet orbital rotation in our solar system animated with SCSS. Let's say 1s rotation represents Mercury's orbital period of 88 days around the sun, then Earth that takes 365 days to make a full rotation, will represent around 4s in this project.

Demo

Under Armour Replica

Replica of the Under Armour website. Fully responsive website, similar to the original one, not pixel perfect but without any errors in the console. Front-end agile work with three other devs, sections merged together.

Demo
